sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
William Penn and the Quakers either impostors, or apostates which they please: proved from their avowed principles, and contrary practices. By Trepidantium Malleus. Shewen, William, 1631?-1695.
[6], 134, [4] p.
printed for the author, and are to be sold by John Lawrence at the Angel in the Poultrey, London : 1696.
Trepidantium Malleus = William Shewen. Advertisements bound at end. Imperfect; pages cropped and tightly bound, with faded print and some loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
